title: Promise Day shareable single-page greeting with emoji overlay and photo grid

requirements.summary: Implement a public single-page Promise Day greeting at / that matches the provided content and loads the three provided image URLs without authentication.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting the app root (/) shows the Promise Day page content without requiring login.
The page includes the same visible content as the provided HTML: hero ü§ù, heading, message paragraphs, and signature text in English as provided.
The three images load from the exact URLs provided in the user HTML and render on the page.

file_operations.description: Create the root app component that renders the Promise Day single-page content directly at / (no auth gating, no multi-page routing). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a PromiseDayPage that reproduces the provided HTML‚Äôs visible content (hero ü§ù, heading, message paragraphs, signature) and renders the 3 images using the exact user-provided URLs. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure document metadata (title/lang) is appropriate for a shareable Promise Day greeting page and aligns with the single-page experience.

requirements.summary: Ensure the emoji shower animation renders as a non-interactive overlay above the card content and cleans up emoji elements after animation.
acceptanceCriteria: Falling/bursting emojis visually pass over the photos and the message text (higher stacking order than the card and its contents).
Emoji elements do not prevent interaction with the page (e.g., pointer events do not block clicks/scroll).
Emoji elements are cleaned up after animation completes (no unbounded DOM growth).

file_operations.description: Implement an emoji shower overlay component with fixed/absolute positioning, high z-index, and pointer-events disabled so it sits above the card content while not blocking scroll/click; ensure timed/animation cleanup to avoid unbounded DOM growth. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire EmojiShowerOverlay into the Promise Day page so the overlay is rendered above the card/photos/message (stacking context) while remaining non-interactive. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Apply the requested responsive photo layout: rings photo on top, remaining two photos below side-by-side with wrapping on small screens.
acceptanceCriteria: The rings image appears above the two other images in the card.
The two non-rings images appear beneath the rings image in a 2-column grid on typical mobile/desktop widths and wrap appropriately on narrow screens.
All images maintain a consistent, polished styling (rounded corners and sensible sizing) and remain responsive.

file_operations.description: Update the photo section to render the rings photo first at the top, followed by a responsive 2-column grid for the remaining two photos (wrapping on narrow widths), with consistent rounded corners and responsive sizing. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Apply a cohesive romantic visual theme (non blue/purple-dominant) with consistent typography, spacing, and card styling across the page.
acceptanceCriteria: The page has a consistent visual system (background, card, headings, body text) that feels intentionally designed.
The layout remains readable and visually balanced on mobile and desktop widths.

file_operations.description: Add Tailwind base/components/utilities plus global theme tokens and base styles to establish a romantic, coherent palette (avoid blue/purple-dominant), typography scale, and consistent spacing.

Apply consistent Tailwind styling for background, card, typography, spacing, and responsive layout to match the romantic theme (avoid blue/purple dominance). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Adjust Tailwind theme extensions (as needed) to support the romantic palette/typography choices used by the page while keeping styling consistent across components.
